description: Contains details about sales orders, including shipping and financial data.

columns.name: SalesOrderID
columns.description: Primary key for SalesOrderHeader records.

columns.name: RevisionNumber
columns.description: Incremental number to track changes to the sales order over time.

columns.name: OrderDate
columns.description: Date the sales order was created.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Date the order is due to the customer.

columns.name: ShipDate
columns.description: Date the order was shipped to the customer.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Order current status. 1 = In process; 2 = Approved; 3 = Backordered; 4 = Rejected; 5 = Shipped; 6 = Cancelled.

columns.name: OnlineOrderFlag
columns.description: 0 = Order placed by salesperson, 1 = Order placed online by customer.

columns.name: SalesOrderNumber
columns.description: Unique sales order identification number.

columns.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
columns.description: Customer purchase order number reference.

columns.name: AccountNumber
columns.description: Financial accounting number reference.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Customer identification number. Foreign key to Customer.CustomerID.

columns.name: ShipToAddressID
columns.description: The ID of the location to send goods. Foreign key to the Address table.

columns.name: BillToAddressID
columns.description: The ID of the location to send invoices. Foreign key to the Address table.

columns.name: ShipMethod
columns.description: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

columns.name: CreditCardApprovalCode
columns.description: Approval code provided by the credit card company.

columns.name: SubTotal
columns.description: Sales subtotal. Computed as SUM(SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal) for the appropriate SalesOrderID.

columns.name: TaxAmt
columns.description: Tax amount.

columns.name: Freight
columns.description: Shipping cost.

columns.name: TotalDue
columns.description: Total due from customer. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Sales representative comments.

columns.name: rowguid
columns.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
